meanings.definition: The state of being cloudy or opaque due to suspended particles.
meanings.sent1: The turbidness of the water made it difficult to see through.
meanings.sent2: The turbidness of the liquid indicated it was not safe to drink.
meanings.sent3: The turbidness of the sky made it hard to predict the weather.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were clouded with turbidness, unable to make a clear decision.
meanings.sent5: The turbidness of the room was like trying to see through a foggy window.

meanings.definition: The quality of being unclear or confused.
meanings.sent1: The turbidness of the situation left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was filled with turbidness, making it hard to understand her point.
meanings.sent3: The turbidness of the instructions led to a hilarious mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The turbidness of his mind reflected the chaos of his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The turbidness of the map caused us to take the wrong turn.
